trans-unit.source: TYPO3 CMS - Professional Web Content Management System
trans-unit.target: Système de Gestion de Contenu web professionnel TYPO3

trans-unit.source:
TYPO3 CMS is a enterprise-class, Open Source Content Management System, used internationally to build and manage websites of all types, from small sites for non-profits to multilingual enterprise solutions for large corporations.

For further information visit typo3.org.

TYPO3 CMS is freely available under the TYPO3-license (GNU/GPL).

You are using %s %s
trans-unit.target:
TYPO3 est un Système de Gestion de Contenu (CMS) libre, flexible et professionnel basé sur PHP et MySQL.

TYPO3 est disponible gratuitement selon les termes de la licence TYPO3 (GNU/GPL).

%s %s

trans-unit.source:
TYPO3 CMS is a enterprise-class, Open Source Content Management System, used internationally to build and manage websites of all types, from small sites for non-profits to multilingual enterprise solutions for large corporations.

For further information visit typo3.org.

TYPO3 CMS is freely available under the TYPO3-license (GNU/GPL).

You are using version %s - Copyright %s %s
Visit typo3.org/community/ if you want to know why TYPO3 rocks.
trans-unit.target: Visitez typo3.org/community/ pour découvrir le dynamisme de la communauté TYPO3

trans-unit.source:
Visit typo3.org/teams/core/members/ for the complete member list.

The Git Repository and the ChangeLog can be found here.
trans-unit.target:
Visitez typo3.org/teams/core/members/ pour découvrir la liste complète des membres.

Le SVN et les "ChangeLog" (journal des évolutions) sont disponibles ici

trans-unit.source: This is a list of the people who contributed to the extensions you're using in your installation.
trans-unit.target: Voici la liste des personnes qui ont contribué au développement des extensions que vous utilisez sur votre installation TYPO3.

trans-unit.source: Displays the basic facts about the TYPO3 application, version and licensing terms.
trans-unit.target: Affiche les informations de base à propos de TYPO3, sa version, et les termes de sa licence.

trans-unit.source:
It would be great if you could donate. TYPO3 CMS is Open Source and relies heavily on donations from its users and supporters.

Thank you for making this great Content Management System even better with your support!
trans-unit.target:
Ce serait génial si vous pouviez faire un don. TYPO3 est Open Source et s'appuie largement sur les dons de ses utilisateurs et sympathisants.
Merci de faire que cet outil de gestion de contenu devienne encore meilleur avec votre aide!

trans-unit.source: TYPO3 CMS core uses and thanks these external Open Source projects:
trans-unit.target: TYPO3 utilise et remercie ces projets open source externes :
